com.communote.server.core.user

Class UserGroupMemberManagementBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.user.UserGroupMemberManagementBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserGroupMemberManagement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UserGroupMemberManagementImpl

    @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED)
public abstract class UserGroupMemberManagementBase
extends Object
implements UserGroupMemberManagement

    Spring Service base class for com.communote.server.service.user.UserGroupMemberManagement, provides access to all services and entities referenced by this service.

    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    UserGroupMemberManagement

    • Method Detail

      • addGroup

        public void addGroup(Long targetGroupId,
                     Long groupId)
              throws GroupNotFoundException,
                     CantAddParentAsChildException,
                     AuthorizationException
        Description copied from interface: UserGroupMemberManagement
        Add a group to a group if it is not already contained.
        Specified by:
        addGroup in interface UserGroupMemberManagement
        Parameters:
        targetGroupId - ID of the target group the other group should be added to
        groupId - ID of the group to add
        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the target group or the group to add does not exist
        CantAddParentAsChildException - in case adding the group would lead to a cyclic group hierarchy
        GroupOperationNotPermittedException - in case the target group is an external group
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not client manager

      • addUser

        public void addUser(Long groupId,
                    Long userId)
             throws GroupNotFoundException,
                    UserNotFoundException,
                    AuthorizationException
        Description copied from interface: UserGroupMemberManagement
        Add a user to a group
        Specified by:
        addUser in interface UserGroupMemberManagement
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the group to add the user to
        userId - the ID of the user to add
        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the group does not exist
        UserNotFoundException - in case the user does not exist
        GroupOperationNotPermittedException - in case the group is an external group
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not client manager

      • addUserForExternal

        public void addUserForExternal(Long groupId,
                               Long userId,
                               String externalSystemId)
                        throws GroupNotFoundException,
                               UserNotFoundException,
                               AuthorizationException
        Description copied from interface: UserGroupMemberManagement
        Adds a user to an external group. The external group must have an externalSystemId that is equal to the value of the externalSystemId parameter.
        Specified by:
        addUserForExternal in interface UserGroupMemberManagement
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the external group to add the user to
        userId - the ID of the user to add
        externalSystemId - the ID of the external system the group should belong to
        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the group does not exist
        UserNotFoundException - in case the user does not exist
        GroupOperationNotPermittedException - in case the group is not a group from the external system identified by the externalSystemId
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the internal system user

      • handleAddGroup

        protected abstract void handleAddGroup(Long targetGroupId,
                                       Long groupId)
                                throws GroupOperationNotPermittedException,
                                       GroupNotFoundException,
                                       CantAddParentAsChildException,
                                       AuthorizationException
        Add a group to a group if it is not already contained.
        Parameters:
        targetGroupId - ID of the target group the other group should be added to
        groupId - ID of the group to add
        Throws:
        GroupOperationNotPermittedException - in case the target group is an external group
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the target group or the group to add does not exist
        CantAddParentAsChildException - in case adding the group would lead to a cyclic group hierarchy
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not client manager

      • removeGroupFromAllGroups

        public void removeGroupFromAllGroups(Long entityId)
                              throws GroupNotFoundException,
                                     AuthorizationException
        Description copied from interface: UserGroupMemberManagement
        Remove a group from all groups it is a member of.
        Specified by:
        removeGroupFromAllGroups in interface UserGroupMemberManagement
        Parameters:
        entityId - The id of the group to remove
        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the group does not exist
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not client manager or the internal system user

      • removeUserForExternal

        public void removeUserForExternal(Long groupId,
                                  Long userId,
                                  String externalSystemId)
                           throws AuthorizationException
        Description copied from interface: UserGroupMemberManagement
        Removes a user from an external group. The external group must have an externalSystemId that is equal to the value of the externalSystemId parameter. If the group does not exist or the user is not a member of that group nothing will happen.
        Specified by:
        removeUserForExternal in interface UserGroupMemberManagement
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the external group
        userId - the ID of the user to remove
        externalSystemId - the ID of the external system the group originated from
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the internal system user

        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException
